nodes.text: Rawk's Nest was a series of buildings on Iego inhabited by "Bantha" Rawk and his family. In 137 ABY the Nest came under attack by Black Sun, trying to force "Bantha" Rawk to pay protection money. He refused and a fight ensued. "Bantha" Rawk, together with his wife Droo and their adoptive children Ahnah, Skeeto and Micah, and the help of the crew of the Mynock managed to defeat the Black Sun enforcers.
